the mistake of a wise man
to consider carefully, to deliberate thoroughly, to think over
a wise idea, polite reference to another's consideration
discreet and well-advised judgment, wise and mature judgment, making judgment with prudence
deep design and forethought, a farsighted and deeply-laid plan
impulsive and imprudent, rash and unthinking
mere slip by someone who is usually very careful, simple mistake by a wise person, point overlooked by a cautious person
even a fool may sometimes come up with a good idea
